summary.para: The SP_INF_SIGNER_INFO structure stores information about an INF file's digital signature.

blockquote.para: [!NOTE] The setupapi.h header defines SP_INF_SIGNER_INFO_V1 as an alias which automatically selects the ANSI or Unicode version of this function based on the definition of the UNICODE preprocessor constant. Mixing usage of the encoding-neutral alias with code that not encoding-neutral can lead to mismatches that result in compilation or runtime errors. For more information, see Conventions for Function Prototypes.

summary.para: Size of this structure, in bytes.
Path to the catalog file, stored in an array of maximum size MAX_PATH characters.
Path to the digital signer of the file, stored in an array of maximum size MAX_PATH characters.
Version of the digital signer, stored in an array of size MAX_PATH characters.
The SP_INF_SIGNER_INFO structure stores information about an INF file's digital signature.

blockquote.para: [!NOTE] The setupapi.h header defines SP_INF_SIGNER_INFO_V1 as an alias which automatically selects the ANSI or Unicode version of this function based on the definition of the UNICODE preprocessor constant. Mixing usage of the encoding-neutral alias with code that not encoding-neutral can lead to mismatches that result in compilation or runtime errors. For more information, see Conventions for Function Prototypes.

The SP_INF_SIGNER_INFO structure stores information about an INF file's digital signature.

For more information, see Conventions for Function Prototypes.
